name: Fragments of Ego DEMO
description:
NOTE: It's recommended that you play the downloadable version instead of the browser version!

Fragments of Ego is an abstract first-person adventure based on the surrealistic internet genre of Weirdcore imagery. Wander through several disjointed locales as you gain powers, encounter strange entities, and piece together a despondent story.

This free demo includes one of the many areas you can explore throughout the game, but is not perfectly reflective of the full experience. As a result, you may encounter bugs while playing. If you do, please leave a comment describing what happened, and I will try to fix it in the full release. 

If you enjoyed this demo and would like to support the development of this game, please consider donating. Your donations allow me to devote more time and resources into bringing this project to life.

Music made with OpenMPT

Sound Effects from www.zapsplat.com
